Plot: A mysterious serial killer is hunting other serial killers - and one FBI agent suspects there may be more to the vigilante than they imagine.
Title: Suspect Zero
Writer: Zak Penn (story), Zak Penn (screenplay), Billy Ray (screenplay)
Actors: Aaron Eckhart, Ben Kingsley, Carrie-Anne Moss, Harry Lennix
tomatoConsensus: Other than Ben Kingsley, there's not much to like in this preposterous thriller.
